713504f-a.title: Manhattan: 51st Street - Madison Avenue
713504f-a.text:
(1)
5lst Street, south side, west from and including Madison
Avenue. St. Patrick's Cathedral is in the foreground.
May 30, 1932.
P.L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(s)
The same four months later. In the background is being
erected the 70 story RCA Building.
September 25, 1932.
P.L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

721376f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 51st Street
721376f-a.text:
Cathedral College, formerly part of Catholic Orphanage, Madison
Avenue, west side, from 52nd to 5lst Streets. In the background
may be seen a portion of St. Patrick's Cathedral.
April 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr, Photographer.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
